name: Retrieval (raquel.carvalho)
description:
Freedom for the retrieval of a package.   

Violet, an orphaned girl with unique psychokinesis abilities, was raised by a science researcher, Dr. Lui. With little to no memory of how she got there, Violet has finally turned eighteen and has become a legal adult. Before Violet leaves, the scientist gives Violet an enticing offer. Violet must travel to an otherworldly planet and retrieve a ‘package.’ The object to retrieve is unknown to her, as she will only discover it once she arrives. If she returns with it, she will be rewarded with riches that will set her up for her life. Violet must explore the galaxy to find the package she was sent off to find. But when Violet finally finds what she was sent to retrieve, she must make a difficult decision on what to do next.
